prompts: Create a playful electric-type Pokemon that has a bright yellow coat and big ears.
Imagine a cute Pokemon that can generate electricity, featuring a small size and adorable face.
Design a Pokemon with a lightning bolt tail and a friendly demeanor that loves to explore.
Show me a tiny electric-type Pokemon with round cheeks and a cheerful expression.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves into a powerful electric creature, starting off as a small, cute version.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a bright yellow and brown color scheme.
Give me a fun and energetic Pokemon that sparks joy wherever it goes, with signature electrical moves.
